mapper.insert: insert into tbl_admin (adminid, adminpw, aname, aaddress, aemail, aphonenumber, shopname, businessnum, shoplogo, thema, titleimg) values(#{adminid}, #{adminpw}, #{aname}, #{aaddress}, #{aemail}, #{aphonenumber}, #{shopname}, #{businessnum}, #{shoplogo},#{thema}, #{titleimg} )
mapper.select: select tbl_pinfo.pno pno, count(distinct pisize) pisize, count(distinct picolor) picolor from tbl_pinfo, tbl_products where tbl_pinfo.pno = #{pno} and tbl_products.adminid = #{adminid}
select adminid from tbl_admin where adminid = #{adminid}
select tbl_question.pno, pname, ptitlephoto from tbl_question, tbl_products where tbl_question.pno = tbl_products.pno and qstatus = 'N' and adminid=#{adminid} order by qno desc
select adminid from tbl_admin where shopname = #{shopname}
